description: Log into the Claims application and pull up the pended claims
query: SELECT * FROM claim_lines WHERE condition_code = '29W' and icn ='{icn}';

description: Validate the LOB on the claim in the LOB database to confirm if it is a Medicaid claim.
query: SELECT h.icn, h.lob, l.description FROM claim_headers h JOIN lob_mapping l ON h.lob = l.code WHERE l.description LIKE '%Medicaid%' and h.icn ='{icn}';

description: Check if the member group number is present on the Medicaid Customer number Grid list. If yes, confirm the member state (Ledger State).
query: SELECT h.icn, h.member_group, g.ledger_state FROM claim_headers h JOIN medicaid_customer_number_grid g ON h.member_group = g.cas_group_number and h.icn ='{icn}';

description: Based on the state, review the State Medicaid master file for retrieving the Medicaid id for the claims.
query: SELECT h.icn, h.member_group_state, m.medicaid_id FROM claim_headers h JOIN state_medicaid_master m ON h.icn = m.claim_number and h.icn ='{icn}';

description: If a denial code is present for the pended claim in the State Medicaid master file, deny the claim using this code and proceed with adjudication. End of process.
query: SELECT h.icn, m.deny_code FROM claim_headers h JOIN state_medicaid_master m ON h.icn = m.claim_number WHERE m.deny_code IS NOT NULL and h.icn ='{icn}';

description: If a denial code is not present for the claim in the master file, use the Medicaid id in the master file to update the details on the claim and proceed with adjudication. If a denial code is present, deny the claim using this code. End of process.
query: SELECT h.icn, m.medicaid_id FROM claim_headers h JOIN state_medicaid_master m ON h.icn = m.claim_number WHERE m.deny_code IS NULL and h.icn ='{icn}';
